peregrine.io.sstable
Class RollingSequenceWriter

java.lang.Object
  peregrine.io.sstable.RollingSequenceWriter
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Closeable, java.io.Flushable, SequenceWriter
Direct Known Subclasses:
DirectBufferRollingSequenceWriter
public abstract class RollingSequenceWriter
extends java.lang.Object
implements SequenceWriter

Write a partition as a given stream of key/value pairs and rollover chunks as they are filled.
